hero.description: The easiest way to grow your business.

sections.title: Growi
sections.description: The best place to start through Influencer marketing.

features.title: Find influencers
features.description: Easily find perfect influencer for your brand by by searching over thousands influencers with various different filters (categories, engagment ratio, price, number of followers...).

features.title: Too many fake influencers?
features.description: Growi regulary checks each profile's engagment ratio, detects fake followers, ..., and blocks all fake influencers, also each influencer has list of previous clients and reviews.

features.title: See real data!
features.description: Growi lets you see posts statistics, so no more screenshots and trust based business, make your ROI calculations based on true data.

banner.title: Want to help?
banner.subtitle: We are always seeking for experts open open for interview.
